Description: AWS CloudFormation template for a load balanced, Auto Scaled sample website.

InstanceType.ConstraintDescription: Must be a valid EC2 instance type.

KeyName.Description: Name of an existing EC2 KeyPair to enable SSH access to the instances
KeyName.ConstraintDescription: Must be the name of an existing EC2 KeyPair.

SSHLocation.Description: The IP address range that can SSH to the EC2 instances
SSHLocation.ConstraintDescription: Must be a valid IP CIDR range of the form x.x.x.x/x.

VPCId.Description: VPCId of your existing Virtual Private Cloud (VPC)
VPCId.ConstraintDescription: Must be a valid VPC ID.

Subnets.Description: The list of SubnetIds in your Virtual Private Cloud (VPC)

UserData.Fn::Base64:
#!/bin/bash yum install -y httpd service httpd start echo "

Hello from $(hostname -f)

" > /var/www/html/index.html

Properties.GroupDescription: Enable HTTP access via port 8888 limited to the load balancer only
Allow internet access to the load balancer on port 80

LoadBalancerDNSName.Description: The DNS name of the load balancer
